channel.title: Need your help
channel.description:
Well i need your help with a CMD code i made, Took me 35 minutes to make, And its a Shop Creator, ON CMD!!, Well i was wondering if it will work, So i can put on my v4 of my Utility.
[b] The code is [/b] [code] @echo off cls echo NPC Id? set /p NpcId=Option: If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder Echo [Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] >> ".\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt" Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo PutNPCCords = true; { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo WanneShop = 30; >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto menu2 :menu2 set /p ShopId=Shop Id: pause goto menu3 :menu3 cls set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop: pause goto menu4 :menu4 cls set /p Cost=Cost of that item: pause Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo %ShopId% 1 1 %ItemId% %Cost%{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" pause goto menu5 :menu5 cls Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" set /p cords=Cords X: pause goto menu6 :menu6 set /p coords=Cords Y: pause goto menu7 :menu7 Echo %NpcId% %cords% %coords%0 0 0 0 0 1{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" pause goto finished :finished echo finished. [/code]
Can someone tell me if it works or not? And please don't leech, Make your own, Its hard but its rewarding.

item.title: Need your help
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:18, topic:155815”][quote author=dog eats dog link=topic=212638.msg1858161#msg1858161 date=1193841265]

If I wanted to really use batch, I’/ convert it to Shell.

Question, How to do you compile and run a server, When you can’t use a batch?

I need to sig that.

Why im asking a question? Do you use frells SDK Kit, I no that you don’t need batch to run server, Im asking you what you use. -.-
[/quote]
Frell’s SDK kit.
Imo…
Frell wouldn’t recognise Java if it bit him in the ass.

And, I use either a command line, or a shell script.[/quote]

It was an example, And fair enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Need your help
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Well i need your help with a CMD code i made, Took me 35 minutes to make, And its a Shop Creator, ON CMD!!, Well i was wondering if it will work, So i can put on my v4 of my Utility.

The code is 

@echo off
cls
echo NPC Id?
set /p NpcId=Option:
If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder
Echo [Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] >> ".\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt"
Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
Echo        PutNPCCords = true; { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
Echo        WanneShop = 30; >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
goto menu2
:menu2
set /p ShopId=Shop Id:
pause
goto menu3
:menu3
cls
set /p ItemId=Item Id you want in your Shop:
pause
goto menu4
:menu4
cls
set /p Cost=Cost of that item:
pause
Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
Echo %ShopId%		1	1	%ItemId%	  %Cost%{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
pause
goto menu5
:menu5
cls
Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
set /p cords=Cords X:
pause
goto menu6
:menu6
set /p coords=Cords Y:
pause
goto menu7
:menu7
Echo %NpcId%	%cords%		%coords%0	0	0	0	0	1{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt"
pause
goto finished
:finished
echo finished.

Can someone tell me if it works or not? And please don’t leech, Make your own, Its hard but its rewarding.

Read full topic
